description: Frank is a 22 year old who works in a motorcycle shop during the day and is a bartender at night.He's got tons of cool stories about his time behind the bar, but the ones we liked the most involved him and some of his customers that would come into the bar and put the moves on him. He spoke about one girl from out of town that insisted he come back with her to her hotel. Once there, they proceeded to have some of the best sex he said he's ever had. He said that anonymous sex is sometimes some of the best. Well, we can believe she probably had a good time... after seeing what Frank is packing inside of those pants, why wouldn't anyone enjoy it?!Watch Frank pleasure himself in 3 scenes: living room, bathroom, and bedroom; before exploding in pure self-indulgence.
title: Frank
